trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label" /> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o controle de servidor Web <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control allows text to be displayed programmatically on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controle permite que o texto a ser exibido por meio de programação em uma página da Web.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LabelDesigner> class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LabelDesigner> classe fornece suporte de tempo de design para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LabelDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a change to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LabelDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> método é chamado quando há uma alteração associados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to derive the `SampleLabel` control from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control, and applies a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> attribute on the `SampleLabel` control to associate it with the `SampleLabelDesigner` class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como derivar o `SampleLabel` de controle do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controlar e aplica um <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> atributo no `SampleLabel` controle para associá-lo com o `SampleLabelDesigner` classe.

trans-unit.source: The code example also derives the `SampleLabelDesigner` from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LabelDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código também deriva de `SampleLabelDesigner` do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LabelDesigner> classe.

trans-unit.source: It overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TextControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.Dashed>, if the original <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> was the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> value.
trans-unit.target: Ela substitui o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TextControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para definir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.Dashed>, se original <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderStyle%2A> foi o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.NotSet> ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BorderStyle.None> valor.

trans-unit.source: This improves the visibility of the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Isso melhora a visibilidade do controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LabelDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LabelDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LabelDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LabelDesigner> classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controle ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que é a origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando há uma alteração no controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LabelDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LabelDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> método é chamado quando o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> evento associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> controle é gerado.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change).
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, isso é em resposta a uma alteração de propriedade do controle (por exemplo, um **propriedades** alteração de grade).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LabelDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs> object and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> base method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LabelDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs> objeto e chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> método de base.
